name: Calculated hours IS Rack Configurations
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(IS Rack Configurations:[IF](<*ISSELECTED(IS_Implementation_Methodology.Non-Standard Build Estimate)*>){<* Eval(((4 * <*VALUE(IS_No_of_Server_Rack_Configurations_(0-10))*> + 2 * <*VALUE(IS_No_of_Workstation_Configurations_(0-10))*>) + ((<*VALUE(IS_No_of_Reviews_(add_Asbuilts)_(2-5))*> * (<*VALUE(IS_No_of_Server_Rack_Configurations_(0-10))*> + <*VALUE(IS_No_of_Workstation_Configurations_(0-10))*>)) * 0.25))) *>}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(IS_Implementation_Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,<*ISSELECTED(IS_GES_Location.None)*>)){<* Eval((((4 * <*VALUE(IS_No_of_Server_Rack_Configurations_(0-10))*> + 2 * <*VALUE(IS_No_of_Workstation_Configurations_(0-10))*>) + ((<*VALUE(IS_No_of_Reviews_(add_Asbuilts)_(2-5))*> * (<*VALUE(IS_No_of_Server_Rack_Configurations_(0-10))*> + <*VALUE(IS_No_of_Workstation_Configurations_(0-10))*>)) * 0.25))) *0.5) *>}{<* Eval(((((4 * <*VALUE(IS_No_of_Server_Rack_Configurations_(0-10))*> + 2 * <*VALUE(IS_No_of_Workstation_Configurations_(0-10))*>) + ((<*VALUE(IS_No_of_Reviews_(add_Asbuilts)_(2-5))*> * (<*VALUE(IS_No_of_Server_Rack_Configurations_(0-10))*> + <*VALUE(IS_No_of_Workstation_Configurations_(0-10))*>)) * 0.25))) *0.5) *1.1) *>}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF])*>
